channel.title: SurrealCraft [Factions][MCMMO][Griefing][Raiding][24/7][SuperNaturals]
channel.description:
[b]SurrealCraft[/b] is a PvP server that likes to encourage Griefing and raiding. There is NO chest protection, so be sure to protect your land with Factions. The world border is set at 5000 to make raiding more interesting and fun. The spawn is nice, and has a market, access to the PvP arena(in progress), nether access, and all sorts of things.
[size=10pt][b][u]The major plugins are:[/u][/b][/size] -Factions -McMMO -Chestshop -MobArena (Now available for everyone! Type /ma help for MobArena help) -SuperNaturals (Choose your own race such as human, vampire, priest, and many more!)
[size=10pt][u][i][b]The rules are:[/b][/i][/u][/size] 1. No hacking (derp) 2. No spamming (including player left the game.) 3. No x-ray 4. Respect staff 5. No griefing spawn or Warzone 6. No PvP logging 7. Griefing is allowd 8. Item duping will result in a ban. 9. Language is allowed but try not to use it in excessive amounts 10. No Caps raging. 11. Have fun!
The website is: [url=http://www.surrealcraft.shivtr.com]www.surrealcraft.shivtr.com[/url]
Server IP: 108.178.27.206:25575

item.title: SurrealCraft [Factions][MCMMO][Griefing][Raiding][24/7][SuperNaturals]
item.dc:creator: @surrealcraft surrealcraft
item.description:
@surrealcraft wrote:

SurrealCraft is a PvP server that likes to encourage Griefing and raiding. There is NO chest protection, so be sure to protect your land with Factions. The world border is set at 5000 to make raiding more interesting and fun. The spawn is nice, and has a market, access to the PvP arena(in progress), nether access, and all sorts of things.

[size=10pt]The major plugins are:[/size]
-Factions
-McMMO
-Chestshop
-MobArena (Now available for everyone! Type /ma help for MobArena help)
-SuperNaturals (Choose your own race such as human, vampire, priest, and many more!)

[size=10pt]The rules are:[/size]
1. No hacking (derp)
2. No spamming (including player left the game.)
3. No x-ray
4. Respect staff
5. No griefing spawn or Warzone
6. No PvP logging
7. Griefing is allowd
8. Item duping will result in a ban.
9. Language is allowed but try not to use it in excessive amounts
10. No Caps raging.
11. Have fun!

The website is: www.surrealcraft.shivtr.com

Server IP: 108.178.27.206:25575
